title: GTA V - Grand Theft Auto 5 * RGH/JTAG  (Babic0708)
description:
Instruction:

1. Download Game: "GTA V - Grand Theft Auto 5 RGH/JTAG (Babic0708)" + HORIZON

2. UnZIP/UnRAR

3. Install Horizon / Connect your ext. HDD / Open Horizon to see Devices

4. Now open: GTA V - Disc 1 /content /0000000000000000 /545408A7 /00000002

5. Drag And Drop this four files to HORIZON: 545408A700000000
                                             545408A700000001
                                             545408A700000002
                                             545408A700000003
   *you will see four windows and one by one save to Flash Drive*
                         (be patient to finish copy one by one)

6. Now open: GTA V - Disc 2 /545408A7 / 00007000 

7. Drag and Drop only second file to HORIZON: 7AA7931FF6863459F017
   now you will see one window and click save to Flash Drive

8. After all you done correctly close Horizon and connect your ext. HDD on
   XBOX 360 RGH/JTAG

9. Go to File Manager on Freestyle Dash or XeX Menu

10. Find Game: USBMU0 /Content /0000000000000000 /545408A7 /00007000
 
11. Run - EFDDE2B76A80A8C66F...  44.0 kb

12. Enjoy :)


NOTE: Just follow the steps...no need to extract anything...very easy if
           you follow this steps :) PLEASE SEED!

NOTE For HORIZON: If Horizon wont see Ext. HDD (0 Devices Loaded) you must
                     FORMAT Ext. HDD on the XBOX 360 and this will work :)

No Virus ... 100% Work







ABOUT THE GAME:

Trouble taps on your window again with this next chapter in the Grand Theft Auto universe, set in the city of Los Santos and its surrounding hills, countryside and beaches. A bold new direction in open-world freedom, storytelling, mission-based gameplay and online multiplayer, Grand Theft Auto V focuses on the pursuit of the almighty dollar in a re-imagined, present-day Southern California.


FEATURES:

Changing Protagonists
Stealing Vehicles
Missions
Heists
Mission Scoring/Replay
Strangers/Freaks/Random Encounters
Combat
Stealth
Environment Useage
Climbing Obstacles
Swimming/Diving
And more!

Publisher: Rockstar Games
Developer: Rockstar North
Genre: Third-Person Action
Language: English
Region: Free
